title: Coinbase Looks to Add Bitcoin Lightning for Payments
description: The move is part of the exchange's broader plan to improve cryptocurrency-based payments globally.

title: Binance's Largest Market is China: WSJ
description: China is Binance’s largest market, amounting to 20% of worldwide volume.

title: Maker and XRP Investors Switching to VC Spectra: A Wise Move?
description: Current market activity is showing a steep increase in investors dumping their Maker (MKR) and Ripple (XRP) tokens for VC Spectra (SPCT). Despite Maker (MKR) and Ripple’s (XRP) recent rally, investors say VC Spectra (SPCT) holds the most long-term potential. So, are investors correct in their predictions about Ripple (XRP)? Let’s find out. >>BUY SPCT TOKENS NOW<<  Maker (MKR) Boosted by Latest Interest ... Read more
